channel.title: Automatic specialATK

item.title: Automatic specialATK
item.dc:creator: @Smokeweasyl420 Smokeweasyl420
item.description:
@Smokeweasyl420 wrote:

Hi i am having some trouble with my special attacks for my dragon scimitar It likes to automatically do all of my available special attacks right when i click on a monster i have looked at many tutorials cant find anything on this please if anyone can help it will be much appreciated and also the animations are slightly off to on it also.
on my 317 burrs client rsps and i am needing some help with this

HERE ARE MY DRAGON SCIMITAR CODES

1st
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && specialAmount > 25){
specialAtk(false, 25, 0, 347);
AttackingOn2.specGFX(656);
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(5) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee) * 0.25;
getHit(5);
specGFX(347);
specOn = false;
usingSpecial = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
}

2nd

}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtkNPC(false, 25, 0, 347);
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(5) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee);
stillgfx(347, EnemyY, EnemyX);
specOn = false;
usingSpecial = false;
}

3rd specialatknpc code for dragon schimy

}
				if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && specialAmount > 24){
			specialAtkNPC(false, 25, 0, 347);
			hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(5) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee);
			stillgfx(347, EnemyY, EnemyX);
			specOn = false;
			usingSpecial = false;
			}
